title: Backend & APIs
description: Secure REST/GraphQL services on Node.js/Nest/Express, data models, and integrations with payments/CRM/ERP.

hero.headline: Scalable APIs That Power Growth
hero.subheadline: Production-grade backend systems, REST/GraphQL APIs, and secure integrations built on Node.js, PostgreSQL, and modern cloud infrastructure.

benefits.title: RESTful & GraphQL APIs
benefits.description: Well-documented, versioned APIs with strong typing, validation, and error handling.

benefits.title: Database Design & Optimization
benefits.description: Normalized schemas, indexing strategies, and query optimization for PostgreSQL/MongoDB.

benefits.title: Authentication & Authorization
benefits.description: JWT, OAuth2, RBAC, and multi-tenant security patterns that scale with your product.

benefits.title: Third-Party Integrations
benefits.description: Payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal), CRMs (Salesforce), ERPs, and custom API connectors.

benefits.title: Caching & Performance
benefits.description: Redis caching, CDN integration, and database read replicas to handle high traffic.

benefits.title: Observability & Monitoring
benefits.description: Structured logging, metrics, alerting, and distributed tracing for production confidence.

process.title: API Design & Data Modeling
process.description: Define endpoints, schemas, and access patterns based on frontend needs and business logic.

process.title: Development & Testing
process.description: Type-safe Node.js development with automated unit/integration tests and API contract testing.

process.title: Security & Compliance
process.description: Penetration testing, encryption at rest/in-transit, and compliance prep (GDPR, SOC 2).

process.title: Deployment & Scaling
process.description: Containerized deployments, auto-scaling, and zero-downtime releases on AWS/GCP.
